channel.title: How do u put screenshot in topics/ and etc.?
channel.description: How can i put a screenshot?

item.title: How do u put screenshot in topics/ and etc.?
item.dc:creator: @iceyfang iceyfang
item.description:
@iceyfang wrote:

worng section, but first…
go to your game screen…hold alt and hit prt scr(print screen)((this is above insert)) and then go to paint…go to select on the paint screen…right click the white area, hit paste. then select the screen area of the picture, and right click, copy, file, new, then paste. save it. go to the forums. find where u want to post it, click insert img,(on the buttons above the area where you type) and then type in"filename.jpg". jeeeees man. thats easy.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u put screenshot in topics/ and etc.?
